website_summaries.verdict: A reliable 5G phone with a fast processor and crisp 120Hz screen.
pros: The S20 is a sleek 5G phone with a powerful camera that boasts an impressive 30-times zoom
The near-edgeless display is gorgeous and has crisp, vivid colors
Good construction quality and responsive touchscreen

customer_reviews.title: FM Radio still not active in the US unlocked version
customer_reviews.text: Despite Samsung's promises, and despite being readily available in the hardware, the FM Radio is not active in the US unlocked version's chip. E.g. NextRadio app doesn't work and says FM Radio is not available. * I will change my rating though if Samsung will provide a solution or working update real soon. *
customer_reviews.author: Ta

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete shipment
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the offered Buds and duo charger. What's up!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Ok Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, go for the plus s20 is almost same looking and size as the s9 & s10 With this specific phone some apps take longer to load, don't know if it's the phone or the app its self. I've restarted the phone and still some apps lag and/or freeze along with some web pages not sure if its phone or network but it has happened on wifi and 5G/4G LTE, I'm sure Samsung will be sending updates sooner or later
customer_reviews.author: Yvenel Cheriscar

customer_reviews.title: Highly doubt its new as described!
customer_reviews.text: The product says new however when I received the package it defiantly seemed that it had been opened and repackaged. There was a clear sticker on top of the already cut clear sticker. In addition to this the protective films were sloppily put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone, but the price is just not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: My first galaxy, ill give it a 3.5 rating. It's ok, but not worth the price tag of $1000. I'll list some pros and cons. Screen is very nice, but I feel like it's to slim. Its extremely fast. The camera is not as good as I thought for $1000 phone. My LG v30 photos look more crisp. Photos taken with my S20 look very noisy with grainy edges. I expected crisp and clean edges. Battery life is decent, but not great. Work day, moderate to heavy use gets me down to 30% by 3pm. Overall, a decent phone but to expensive for what you get in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: TimFromLA

customer_reviews.title: Fake bill of goods
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace my S10 which was damaged. This phone lasted less than a month until one day it could not get a signal from my provider and when i go to restart it, it becomes bricked. phone will not respond to charging or hard restart button press. I'd wait give it some time until samsung irons out the kinks in their new flagship show.
customer_reviews.author: rogue

customer_reviews.title: It's still not an Apple
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of my Apple 11 Pro only because once the new one is out, it wouldn't be worth the price I sold it for.....believe it or not, I actually sold it for a profit. I got the Samsung 20plus 5G for the 5G and because I'm soon ridding myself of my Honda Accord Touring and going with a Hyundai Sonata Limited. The Limited will work with Apple, but it won't be able to do all of the things the Samsung Android App will be to do like giving someone a pass key via phone. I've got to admit.....I MISS MY APPLE TERRIBLY.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Andriolo

customer_reviews.title: Display has very poor uniformity
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning this, the display uniformity is terrible. Noticed it instantly, greys appear pink at the bottom of the screen. I wouldn't expect this from a $200 phone let alone an expensive flagship like this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Screen scratched in the box
customer_reviews.text: The product I recieved came scratched right out of the box??? I went to apply my screen protector on my brand new out of the box phone and there's already damage to this "new phone".
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M Kohut

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I had a S9 plus that was a great phone but I found too heavy to hold a lot. The weight of this phone, without sacrificing the 6.2 size screen, has been wonderful. The camera zoom is a huge jump from the S9. Really impressive photos. I've had no problem with the fingerprint reader or face recognition. A huge bonus was that Android auto wasn't working for months on my S9 and now works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Light did not work to seal the glue, and once i had it on my phone the finger print didn't work anymore. Maybe its cause it d I didn't dry all the way, which was lucky since I needed it off to get in my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Justiss

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: super responsive, great in screen fingerprint reader that works way better than the one on the s10, face recognition sticks and doesn't work at night at all, great loud clear reception on both ends, great camera, great size, nice bright ambled screen, good battery life, phone is super fast and multitasking and gaming is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the more moderate size of the S20, compared to the plus & ultra - fits better in my pocket, and my hand. And the phone is, frankly, impressive. I love the O.S. One great aspect which I did not expect is the length of time I get on a full battery - good programming and design I think. All in all, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sierkobar

customer_reviews.title: great phone upgrade
customer_reviews.text: upgraded from a LG g6, this was a huge difference in speed performance and features the on-screen fingerprint reader is garbage but the face recognition is pretty fast the camera is great with a decent stock camera app. I love the AI camera for taking take videos and generating photos automatically
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D.

customer_reviews.title: The finger print reader works one out of 20 attempts, big regression from S8
customer_reviews.text: I "upgraded" from an S8 to the S20 and the fingerprint reader is the worst regression so far, extremely annoying, just can't get it to work. The face recognition is terrible too, I end up having to enter my PIN 95% of the time. So far it's been a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Isidro Hegouaburu

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what it claims to be!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my US T-Mobile Galaxy S7. Works perfectly as long as your carrier uses a GSM Network (not CDMA). Much less expensive than buying the same phone from your service provider... plus there isn't any of the the extra bloatware that cellular providers add to android (and you can't remove unless you root) on the phones they sell in house. As for the phone itself. The S20 is very good. Great speed, Great screen, Great Battery life, Lots of storage. Sound is good... Camera is just okay. It's pretty much what you should expect from a current generation phone from a top tier producer.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: SIM reader failure.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this s20 as refurbished so I expect some issues. But the one thing that failed to work was the sim card reader. Tried multiple sim cards. Went to verizon to get a brand new card had it activated still refuse to read. Took it to a repair shop. Said they currently could not buy a sim card reader replacement part. Sadly I have return it. Buying new from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dwhite

customer_reviews.title: it's a Samsung, nuff said!
customer_reviews.text: I went from the S8 to the 20 and absolutely love it. The battery life is incredible and still I have all the familiar features of the Samsung family that I'm used too. Cameras are awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Exner

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished and great deal to BOOT!
customer_reviews.text: I love the new Galaxy S20 5G, I decided to purchase a refurbished phone instead of brand new because within two, it would've depreciated to a third of price. By purchasing a refurbished phone I got a fairly new phone at a third of cost of original price! Sincerely; TonyL
customer_reviews.author: TonyL

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever owned. I just love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Calixto

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with Xfinity Mobile!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried for days with several different agents from Xfinity mobile and the unlocked S20 that Amazon sent me is NOT compatible with their network. Buyer beware! EDIT: After getting an S20 from Xfinity, I think Amazon sent me a dual-sim version rather than the proper one sim version.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my phone for about a almost a week now and love it. Its very user friendly and easy for me to setup. Great size and the camera is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: 5g band locked, this is not unlocked,  FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: It is false that this phone in unlocked, it comes with locked 5g band, not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Alfaro Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: New scuffs??
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is totally new and I purchased it new...opened the box and there is scuff marks and fingerprints on the face of this phone. 3 stars for the uncertainty of this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Security, battery-life, speed(RAM) 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Battery life is spectacular and the size of this phone is perfect for carrying in front pocket. Security features, battery-life and speed(RAM) are the best I've ever experienced with a cell-phone...I Recommend purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Phone is great, Amazon shipping not so great
customer_reviews.text: The phone is incredible. However, Amazon shipping was less than acceptable. Original phone box in a oversized cardboard box with NO padding. The thing bounced around in the box all the way to the house
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Works with att
customer_reviews.text: New in box. Put in att sim card. Has worked perfectly for two days.
customer_reviews.author: P326down

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Phone
customer_reviews.text: Could not ask for a better performing phone. Sound and app performance is flawless. Fantastic camera with easy to use controls and adjustment. My G8 cell was great. The Samsung Galaxy S20 is "greater"
customer_reviews.author: lone star

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic device, if you're not looking for a HUGE phone!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an LG Stylo 4, and the change is immense! Having 12GB of RAM (Unlocked 5G verison), and the latest and greatest Snapdragon 865 CPU makes this phone incredibly snappy! There's no waiting between loading apps, the 120Hz refresh rate is phenomenal, and I could go on forever about how much I love this phone! I was able to get this via Amazon Monthly Payments, so that hurts the wallet a little less over time, but I still feel I'll be happy with this device for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Demented

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: The phone kept constantly heating up whenever I was video chatting or gaming and the battery wasn't all that great. My boyfriend has the same phone but he didn't have the same problems I did so I'm just guessing I got the one with a bad battery.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Heating and edges was rough.
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box start up the phone 📱 start heating right away . Edges looks sharp or rough see.s like screen has been replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Fawad Ali

customer_reviews.title: best galaxy phone
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and long lasting battery life with amazing camera features 😍
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Father Day Gift was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Father Day Gift was a hit! First package came missing the phone great customer service replacement sent. Came a day later after father day but he was happy about it so it made up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tram Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Samsung galaxy20s
customer_reviews.text: Battery life amazing,camera amazing lots of space or gas. Beautiful and practical designs,makes taking selfish a breeze best phone I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The phone doesn't charge
customer_reviews.text: I received the phone yesterday I plugged in to charge the battery and didn't charge it
customer_reviews.author: fannilescano

customer_reviews.title: Screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Really good but my only problem is the screen protector from the box have a little scratch so i changed the screen protector instantly
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Charger won't charge my phone
customer_reviews.text: Just got my phone in today, the phone and earbuds seem to work great so far but the charger that came with my phone doesn't work at all on my phone. So now I have a great phone I can't use because it can't charge.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie A.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: For not being "brand new" it sure looks brand new! Very happy with my purchase. The sticker dust protector was even still on the top of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: System speed is great
customer_reviews.text: what I didn't like were the cameras and the volume is lowered
customer_reviews.author: aguilar,martin

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used product but you would be very know. Very happy with my lurchase.
customer_reviews.author: RUFE68

customer_reviews.title: Yesterday I told you that I not received the package but I received today
customer_reviews.text: I wanna let you that I received the package today, yesterday I didn’t see that but I just received today
customer_reviews.author: tresor

customer_reviews.title: Favourite phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Really fast, great battery life and love the fast refresh!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: good phone and unlocked so good for any carrier
customer_reviews.text: I like the 120hz and super fast charging and the speed at which the phone operates is crazy
customer_reviews.author: Latique Davis

customer_reviews.title: very nice panel, easy data migration
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from galaxy s9+ to s20 Phone comes with a screen protector already installed which was a surprising find. Swapped all of my data over with smart switch and it was a breeze. The 120hz refresh rate is definitely noticeable, everything just feels way more responsive. Overall very good experience. Will update if anything changes. 3/9 update: the only issue I've found so far is the GPS for Google maps has been a little wonky. I've read that using smartswitch (what I used) can cause wifi/GPS problems. I rebooted the phone and it hasn't happened again, but if it continues I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Pixel killer at last
customer_reviews.text: Coming from pixel 3 and a long history of pixels I was skeptical. However I'm very impressed in every department. I think Google has a bit of an edge on the software but Samsung nailed the rest. The screen is absolutely stunning vs pixel. The camera is better at well which surprised be. Overall don't listen to the haters here, they have strange requirements that most of us do not.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Pricey Phone
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this Samsung S20 from an S9. I'm slowly getting used to the new placement of the fingerprint reader. I thought the larger battery would give me more time between charges, but it's about the same. The S20 seems to capture weak cell signals better than any other phone I've had. The voice comes through nice and clear without breaking up.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Timbers

customer_reviews.title: Wait for the next one
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. Simple phone. Nothing particularly great. Too much for what it is. Sorry just the truth. And Samsung/Amazon trade in program is a joke. Don't consider it as part of your buying power of this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Fish

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Two - Both Were LOCKED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two Samsung Galaxy S20 5G Unlocked cell phones - one for myself and one for a friend. They both arrived yesterday. When I tried to get a SIM card from my carrier, I was told this phone is locked and cannot be used! I checked with a different carrier, and was told the same. My friend contacted her provider, and was told "This is not an AT&T phone and can't be used". I returned both to Amazon, and two replacements should arrive tomorrow. I'll provide an UPDATE.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hardware tainted by a very controlled software experience
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is amazing. I love the way the phone feels and all of the hardware decisions were clearly thought out. I want to love the phone. Then you turn it on. Samsung's software choices are horrible. There is so much bloatware and Samsung branded apps installed, that cannot be uninstalled, that you feel violated. Using this phone I feel like a prisoner inside Samsung's corporate prison.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Foster

customer_reviews.title: phone is a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This phone is no better than the galaxy 9. Waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuy

customer_reviews.title: A good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the S7 and I'm loving it, the screen isn't much bigger but it is longer for sure. Great for a lot of apps, and movies especially. The speakers are also really good, I believe it uses both the bottom and the top speaker for all audio as well. Fingerprint reader is great BUT you can't use those cheap $10 glass screen protectors on this phone. Either you have to settle for plastic film or buy an expensive special uv glass protector so the fingerprint reader will still work. Other then that I have no issues with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out how to transfer all my information from my old phone. And its much smaller than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy David Crooks

customer_reviews.title: LEMON phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone went completely BLACK after days of use. It would not power up for nothing! Still waiting on a refund after shipping back.
customer_reviews.author: UT Mom

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, good battery life, I love the 120 refresh rate. Fingerprint sensor works better when the screen protector is off and unlocks 80% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin K

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S20 5G owner
customer_reviews.text: Got this product the other day, so far so good. I like the snappy feel and the fluid screen. The battery life is what I purchased this phone for, and am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Above my expectations
customer_reviews.text: My main concern was about the battery, but it turns out to be enough for two days of light use. I had a S8 before and can conclude that the S20 is a good evolution. S8's battery wouldn't be enough for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Matheus Schossler

customer_reviews.title: Works good setup is difficult.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived well packaged and on time. Setting up with Verizon was a nightmare, but all else is working good. I would upgrade from this model to eliminate some of those problems. Might be worth the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is really good. Wireless charging of other devices doesn't work because I installed a magnetic mount, no fault of the phone. Was neat to charge devices wirelessly when I first got it. You'll get much faster charging using the physical port though. I must note the speaker qualtiy is quite good producing some surpsing depth from the external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: STUCK TO SPRINT??
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone came without scratches in great condition, everytime I turn on the phone it says insert original uicc and seems to be locked to the operator sprint. I'm not sure if this is the case with any other phones or just mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Working great ! I was worried to buy a cellphone on Amazon but luckily I did and the cellphone has worked great so far. Cheaper that buying with my carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Lsantiago

customer_reviews.title: Samsungs for life
customer_reviews.text: Loving this phone! Upgraded from the S8 & Im glad we stuck w Samsungs. The transfer was effortless w the included transfer cord & it even saved all my apps & settings. Phone came in perfect condition & everything works as advertised. Camera is so clear & the 5g makes everything faster.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon F

customer_reviews.title: This is one terrific phone. The best so far.
customer_reviews.text: full function right out of the box. The camera is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: DPK

customer_reviews.title: 🌌🌫️
customer_reviews.text: This S20 in Cosmic Gray, best phone I've ever owned. 😈
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Anthony Yolich

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but the battery life is not good enough. Also, unlike S9 plus, the face recognition cannot be used to authenticate third-party apps. You're limited to the fingerprint or PIN code.
customer_reviews.author: mikeoki.oki

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy S20 is a very good phone. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Dont go by a few bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: I just got this phone and some of the reviews that say the phones been used or poorly wrapped is false. This phone came brad new for me a looks wonderful. Can't wait to use it more
customer_reviews.author: Tmoney

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it
customer_reviews.text: No problems here. Upgraded from a much cheaper phone and am blown away by the camera and quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Delivery Method
customer_reviews.text: Hello. The overall product is great & what I was expecting. The disappointment for me comes from the delivery method/means. It was delivered in a box 6 times the size of the box that help the phone. So the phone was banging around in the box all the way from the warehouse. You would think for the price of this item they could have added in some cushion?
customer_reviews.author: Travis

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S20 5G Factory Unlocked New Android Cell Phone US Version | 128GB of Storage | Fingerprint ID and Facial Recognition | Long-Lasting Battery | US Warranty |Cosmic Gray
product_meta.description: Style:S20 5G| Color:Cosmic Gray| Size:128GBMore camera, more power, more fun – in a slim, balanced form. Create anywhere on the sleek, powerful Galaxy S20 5G with an expansive 6. 2” Infinity-O display and radical new 30x Space Zoom. Galaxy S20 5G’s modern design gives you an immersive, cinema-quality experience with next-level functionality. Take pro-quality, hi-res images and video with a groundbreaking 64MP camera and full system of studio lenses with super stabilization. Features like the Single Take AI make it quick and easy to capture multiple photos and video with a single tap. Zoom in close, even from 100 feet away, and capture crisp images at night, even without flash, with Bright Night mode. Share your content in real time with double-tap sharing and get hours of power from minutes of charge with Super Fast Charging. Galaxy S20 5G’s intelligent battery lasts all day to power every scroll, click, call, tap, playlist and season finale. Do more of what you love with the device that gives you more. Note: Samsung Galaxy S20 5G does not operate on the Verizon 5G mmW network. It will operate on the Verizon 4G LTE network. See carriers for details. Main Display Technology: Dynamic AMOLED 2X, Color Depth: 16M, Wi-Fi Connectivity: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax 2.4G+5GHz, HE80, MIMO, 1024-QAM,USB Interface: USB Type-C,Bluetooth: Bluetooth v5.0,Water-resistant: Yes,ANT+: Yes.
feature_bullets: Power of 5G: Get next-level power for everything you love to do with Samsung Galaxy 5G; Share more, game harder, experience more and never miss a beat
Single Take AI: Capture video and multiple types of images with one tap of the shutter button; Lenses, effects and filters capture the best of every moment, every time

Hi-Res Camera Zoom: Capture hi-res images as if you’re 3 feet away, from 100 feet away; Whether you want to zoom in close from afar or magnify details nearby, the new 30x Space Zoom gives you impressive power and clarity
Bright Night Mode: Capture crisp images and vibrant video in Bright Night mode and create high-quality content in low light – no flash needed

Super Fast Charging: Charge up quicker with Super Fast Charge so you can keep moving with more juice; Give your buds – or Galaxy buds – a boost of power with Wireless PowerShare right from Galaxy S20 5G
All-Day Battery: Galaxy S20 5G’s intelligent battery uses an algorithm to learn from how you live to optimize power and take you through a day or more of work and life without ever giving out on you
Massive Storage: Generous storage out of the box and expandable memory means you never have to delete what’s important to you; Memory card sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars346 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
